adrFormatAddress: 718 11th Ave, New York, NY 10019-5047, USA

originalText.text: Shame the reviews for the overpriced gas station get mixed in with the garage reviews. Lovely people working at the service center. Skilled mechanics who work for fair rates and don't overcharge. Devout men who have a small mosque or prayer center in a room off the garage. Mr. Khan always had a kind word to say to my kids. Manager Abdul is a nice guy. Love Bisma

originalText.text: Highly recommend the services of Bisma Service Station. I was helped by the manager, Kenny, who was incredibly kind and helpful in inspecting the used car I was about to purchase. He was thorough, honest, and very kind. I would highly recommend his shop for anyone in need of his services.

text.text: Highly recommend the services of Bisma Service Station. I was helped by the manager, Kenny, who was incredibly kind and helpful in inspecting the used car I was about to purchase. He was thorough, honest, and very kind. I would highly recommend his shop for anyone in need of his services.

originalText.text: You will be robbed if you refuel in this gas station. Dishonest. I took gas 2 times from here. First time I didn’t realize that they stole my money. 2nd time I got pretty sure that this one is a pure robber. I paid for 2 gallons. But fuel level on my dashboard didn’t change that much. I heard the sound of gas flowing on the gas tank but it didn’t fill out nothing. Somebody should call cops

originalText.text: Stopped by for an inspection and was told I couldn't have ANY tint on my car in NYS. These people don't know what they're talking about.

text.text: Stopped by for an inspection and was told I couldn't have ANY tint on my car in NYS. These people don't know what they're talking about.

originalText.text: Called and they told me I could bring my car in for an inspection. Waited well over an hour and then no one was available to work on it and they closed.  Don't trust them, don't waste your time.
